msg.msgText: The server monitoring data including monitoring data of messaging objects, can be obtained using the "imaserver stat" command. SYNTAX: imaserver stat imaserver stat help imaserver stat StatObject help imaserver stat StatObject [StatObjectOptions] EXAMPLE: imaserver stat Subscription help The valid options are: StatObject Choose from one of the following statistics objects: Subscription Queue Topic MQTTClient Connection Endpoint DestinationMappingRule Memory Store Server Transaction StatObjectOptions Options for the statistics object.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
